subject: Crypto payment question
description_text:
Hello,

I was wondering if Solana is an acceptable crypto payment method? Also how
does the crypto payment process work? Do I just send the amount listed for
the product and then the order is automatically processed, or do I send an
email after saying I sent crypto and then tell you what I ordered?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Domas Dicpetris,  We currently do not accept cryptocurrency payments. You may pay using PayPal or a credit card.

When I check out, it lets me use phantom wallet and pay with USDC, is that
a valid payment method?


On Mon, Dec 22, 2025 at 5:36 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Domas Dicpetris,    As long as payment can be completed, it's feasible.  Merry Christmas!
